articles.title: Italy wins Eurovision: 'Rock and roll never dies'
articles.description: Italy's Måneskin have won the Eurovision Song Contest 2021 with their entry, Zitti e Buoni.
articles.content:
Italy's Måneskin have won the Eurovision Song Contest 2021 with their entry, Zitti e Buoni.
The UK's James Newman came last, getting zero points from both the jury and the public.
